Synopsis:
Tom Avery (Martin Sheen) is a renowned ophthalmologist who lives in California. One day he receives a call from France where he announced that his son Daniel (Emilio Estevez) has died in a storm in the Pyrenees. Although the relationship with him was never very good to have an opposite view of life, Tom is desolate and travels to France to recover his son. She discovers that Daniel began to do the Camino de Santiago and decide to do it.

Production notes:
The film was shot for 7 weeks along the Camino de Santiago and is produced in association with Filmax Elixir Films; has sponsorship Xacobeo 2010 Galicia, with the collaboration of ICAA and Xunta de Galicia and with the participation of TVG .
One aspect to note is the soundtrack composed by Tyler Bates.
